thread.section_title: Hotel L'Antoine - UPDATED 2017 Reviews & Price Comparison (Paris, France) - TripAdvisor
thread.title: Quaint with assertive style
thread.title_full: Quaint with assertive style - Review of Hotel L'Antoine, Paris, France - TripAdvisor

author: Yanis J
title: Quaint with assertive style
text:
Excellent location in a vibrant neighborhood next to the Bastille square and the adjoining streets lined up with joyful bars and restaurants.
The room design is an ode to tasteful quaint decoration, an harmonious mix of old fashion French interior design and modern appliances.
I was a bit unsure in the pics posted on the hotel website, but all worked out just perfectly well once I stepped in our Junior Suite.
The reservation desk attendant was spot-on for our separate check-ins and baggage storage requirements.
And the cherry on top of my personal cake: hot water pressure was a dream and the bathtub an invitation to a warm nap.
